div.p: Optimal decarbonization and temperature. a Decarbonization over time for the reference case optimal policy that excludes health co-benefits (blue line) and in the full RICE + AIR optimal policy that includes health co-benefits (red line). b Estimated global temperature rise above preindustrial levels that would occur given the decarbonization in a. Decarbonization is relative to a business-as-usual scenario without any climate action, and 100% decarbonization signifies zero net carbon emissions
